description: Estimate the probability distribution over first-appearance times for each molecule in a RAF simulator. Use the provided training trajectories to learn the distribution, then return probabilities for every snapshot time and the 'none' event per molecule and simulator seed.

api.instructions: Call get_training_data() to obtain trajectories for each macro seed. compute First-appearance distributions per molecule, output distributions keyed by macro seed -> species -> category (snapshot time as string or 'none').
